product_description: Product Description BISSELL PET Spot & Stain formula is made for portable carpet cleaners. This powerful formula tackles tough pet messes that happen on your carpet and upholstery, including urine, vomit and blood. It also removes tracked-in dirt and strong odors from pet accidents on upholstery, carpeted stairs and other high traffic areas. Plus, when you use it as directed, it's safe to use around kids and pets since it does not contain any heavy metals, phosphates or dyes. In fact, the ingredients in this formula have been carefully evaluated by the U. S. Environmental Protection Agency to earn the agency's Safer Choice label, meaning it's safer for the people and pets in your home and better for the environment as a whole. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear. Brand Story By

product_description: Give your carpets a deeper, more effective clean with Resolve Steam Carpet Cleaner Solution, specially formulated for use in steam and deep‑cleaning machines. This professional‑strength solution penetrates deep into carpet fibers to remove embedded dirt, stubborn stains, and lingering odors from everyday spills, pets, and high‑traffic use. As the formula works through your carpet, it lifts out trapped soils and refreshes fibers, leaving your home smelling clean and your carpets feeling soft. Perfect for families and pet owners, Resolve Steam delivers a powerful clean without leaving behind sticky residue—so carpets stay cleaner for longer. Compatible with most upright & compact steam cleaning machines, this solution is ideal for whole‑room cleaning, seasonal deep‑cleans, and revitalizing worn or heavily used carpet areas. With Resolve Steam, you get reliable, professional‑grade results right at home.

Directions **MUST BE DILUTED EVEN IF YOU HAVE A DETERGENT TANK** Pre-treat tough stains and pet accidents with Puracy Natural Stain Remover. Machines: Add hot tap water to clean water tank, add cleaner, gently shake. After shampooing, use hot tap water in clean water tank to rinse cleaner from surface. By Hand: Mix warm water and cleaner in a bucket. Soak a clean cloth in bucket and gently agitate affected area. Repeat steps using fresh warm water and a clean towel to remove any cleaner from surface.

short_description: PET CARPET CLEANING SOLUTION: Featuring a fast-acting formula with the power of Oxy, Hoover Oxy Pet Carpet Cleaner Solution eliminates tough urine stains and odors so you can enjoy a beautifully clean home.
THE POWER OF OXY permanently removes and deodorizes dirt, stains and odors – keeping your home bright and refreshed with a clean ocean breeze scent.
WHOLE HOME CLEANING: This Hoover carpet cleaner solution is perfect for carpet, rugs, stairs and more. It even works as an upholstery cleaner.
PEACE OF MIND: Clean with confidence, knowing our carpet cleaners are made without phosphates, phthalates or parabens to ensure a safe environment for your home.

PAIR WITH HOOVER CARPET CLEANER MACHINE: For spotless results, pair this solution with a Hoover carpet cleaning machine. Go cordless with our innovative ONEPWR technology or enjoy the automatic cleaning of the SmartWash Pet.
product_description: Designed to tackle tough pet messes, Hoover Oxy Pet Carpet Cleaning Formula is our best at permanently eliminating pet stains and urine odors. This carpet shampooer solution powerfully neutralizes stubborn odors with Oxy technology that quickly and effectively removes new and old stains – leaving your carpets smelling fresh and clean with an ocean breeze scent. Made without phosphates, phthalates or parabens to give you peace of mind. For the best whole home clean, pair this solution with a Hoover carpet cleaner machine. For more than 100 years, Hoover has designed powerful, easy-to-use products that clean your entire home from floor to ceiling. Since 1908, consumers and businesses have trusted Hoover to provide reliable, innovative cleaning solutions. Today, we offer a comprehensive line of products for general and special-purpose vacuuming, including full-size uprights and canisters, deep cleaners, and hard floor cleaners.
